name: get_data_for_portfolio_tool
description: Get the relevant information needed to create the portfolio website of the user like their name, industry, relevant urls as per industry like github for developer, dribble for designers, soundcloud for musiciians etc, depending on domain. Start with 4-5 questions and then depending on the answers given ask further questions.

question_format.description: The format of the question, and expected answer format

question_text.description: The actual question text string that the user will be asked to answer

question_meta.description: Additional metadata based on the question_format

options.description: An array of options for radio and checkbox question_format

answer_values.description: The expected answer values, for radio and checkbox answer type, comma separated options will work. Use 'NULL' for questions without predefined answer values.
